/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The street itself is lined with trees and buildings on both sides, creating a corridor of urban life. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city dwellers going about their day. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the scene.
